description:
I am looking for a sublet from May 1st, 2023 to take over my lease, with the opportunity of renewing the lease starting August 2023.
- It is a furnished room in a 3-bedroom apartment with a private bathroom (inside the room). Only the kitchen and living room are shared (visit https://hheleanoratwalnut.com for pictures and more info).
- The current rent is $867, with everything (electricity, water, fast internet) included.
- The bus stops right in front of the building, and it is a 3min walk to the 46th St station (Market-Frankford line).
- It is within walking distance of the University City campuses and there are great restaurants and stores all around.
PS: I am giving out my lease so there is a possibility to renew the lease for the next year, but you must be attending a school in the area (University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Walnut Hill College, University of the Sciences).

title: Top floor condo w/ loft + garage parking at The Grande at Riverview
description:
THE CONDO
A rare gem on the 4th floor of Building 2 at The Grande at Riverview (300 W. Elm). This upgraded unit includes dark granite countertops, hardwood floors in the kitchen and entry, dark 42" maple cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a vaulted ceiling, and custom-finished closet. title: Beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista
description:
Welcome to Carriage Mews, a beautiful tucked away community located in the heart of Bella Vista and the Meredith School Catchment, offering 1-car garage parking and a quiet shared courtyard. This 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom, extra wide townhome has been nicely updated and maintained throughout the years. Enter directly through the garage to the first floor featuring an open kitchen and dining area, a large pantry, a conveniently located half bath and a coat closet. The updated kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, quartz countertops, a nicely tiled backsplash, gas cooking, and an island for additional storage and counterspace. The spacious dining room (could also double as additional living space) features a wood burning fireplace and glass siding doors overlooking the beautiful well-manicured courtyard. Up the stairs is an oversized living room with hardwood floors, built-in cabinets, a ceiling fan and a large storage closet. This floor also features two nicely sized bedrooms both with closets and great natural light, a laundry closet, and a full bathroom with a tub. Continue up to the beautiful primary bedroom with south facing sliding glass doors to the Juliette Balcony, a wall of closets and access to your private bathroom with a tub and stall shower. Off the bedroom is a bonus living space and additional closets, great for a home office, playroom or an additional lounging area. Lastly, exit out to the private deck with tree top views, perfect for relaxing with a good book. Many recent updates: new Anderson doors & noise cancelling windows (2019), HVAC (2021), washer & dryer (2017), kitchen appliances (2019), and more! Plenty of storage throughout the home as well as in the garage. Located on a quiet street just off Cianfrani Park. Quick walk to Whole Foods, ACME, the Italian Market and some of the city’s best restaurants. Immediate move-in available.
705-11 Pemberton St #711

title: Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city
description:
Looking for a spacious modern home centrally located to center city and surrounding areas. Blocks away from award winning restaurants and theatres. This stunning 4 floor townhome with over 3,000 square feet of livable space offers an open concept great outdoor space with a patio off the kitchen and a deck off the hallway on 3rd floor, which gives an amazing view of the center city skyline. The interior of the home has 5 bedrooms , 4.5 bathrooms and finished basemen and 2 car garage with additional storage. The entrance to the home is accessed from a private walk -way off of 15th St. or from the garage . Step inside and you are greeted by luxurious amenities and stylish finishes . The foyer is nicely tiled with to the left is a full bedroom and bath , closet , entrance to basement and access to the garage. Walk up the stairs to the 2nd floor where you are greeted with an open floor plan of your main living space which consist of your living room, gourmet kitchen with beautiful black quartz counter tops and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher , refrigerator ,walk-in pantry, formal dining room, powder room and patio. Head upstairs to the 3rd floor where you will find the master suite with an amazing walk- in closet 4 piece bathroom, soaking tub, stall shower, double vanity, dual flush toilet and two windows to take in the bright natural light of the sun. At the rear of the hallway sits bedroom #3. Head up to the 4th floor and you will find two more bedrooms and a hall bath, laundry room , storage space and deck that over looks the center city skyline. The basement is fully finished with full bathroom , very high ceilings, great for entertaining, gym or private living quarters. The two car garage has two entrances one leading directly into foyer and one that leads to basement. Truly a must see!

title: Wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home!
description:
Welcome to 244 S Warnock St! This is a wonderful 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom single family home in the heart of walkable Washington Square West. Enjoy the convenience of in-unit laundry and central air for year-round comfort. Your living room welcomes you home with a sun-soaked atmosphere and a decorative fireplace with mantle and built-in shelving. Continue back to your gorgeous kitchen boasting tile flooring, wood cabinetry above and below, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, gas oven / stove, and refrigerator. Head upstairs to the 2nd Floor to view 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, and then to the primary suite on the 3rd Floor. This large primary bedroom offers abundant sunlight, good closet space, and an attached full bathroom for a luxurious lifestyle. There's a sizable brick patio for entertaining guests in the warmer months - schedule a tour today! About The Neighborhood: Washington Square West is a walkable neighborhood surrounded by convenient shopping, public transportation, and nightlife options. You'll be just a few blocks from City Hall, iconic South Street, Pennsylvania Hospital, Washington Square, Independence Hall, and the Walnut Street Theater. Close proximity to PATCO, Jefferson Station, the Broad Street Line, the Market-Frankford El Line, and ample bus routes. There are tons of local eatery and hotspots within small radius of this great home including Middle Child, Greenstreete Coffee, Little Nonna's, Strangelove's, Monster Vegan, Mixto, Dirty Frank's, Green Egg's Cafe, Yellowtail, and countless more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Strictly, no pets. Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income, credit history to be considered (i.e. no active collections), no evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history with on-time rental payments. Exceptions to this criteria may exist under the law and will be considered.
244 S Warnock St

title: 4 bedroom 1.5 bath in University City
description:
Four bedroom 1.5 bath home in the beautiful and convenient KINGSESSING AREA OF UNIVERSITY CITY! FRESHLY PAINTED AND READY FOR MOVE-IN MAY 1!
4 bedroom 1.5 bath home on the 1200 block of South 50th Street, just a 1/2 block to sprawling Kingsessing Park. Within walking distance to University of the Sciences, Clark Park, Baltimore Ave corridor (shopping and restaurants/bars), and Routes 11, 13 and 34 Trolley (Green Line).
This home has been freshly painted and has an open floor plan of over 1500 square feet of living space.  Powder room on first floor and recently renovated kitchen with ceramic tile. First floor laundry! Big, clean basement. Recently renovated full hall bath on second floor with tiled bath and floor. All new / refinished flooring. Backyard for bbq or entertainment. Plenty of street parking on this great block. Pets acceptable with additional pet deposit.
$1495 per month plus utilities (water, electric and gas). 1st, last and 1 month security required for move-in ($4485)

title: Chesterbrook Townhouse 2BR/2BA
description: Available Starting early July 2023.  Desirable end unit on Flintlock lane.  Spacious 2 bedroom townhouse with loft area and 2.5 baths.  Hardwood floors all downstairs and entry way.  Many updates completed recently.  Large kitchen with full granite, window, island, and a dining area.  Kitchen has slider door to backyard/patio, with 16 feet of glass (natural light!).  Open living room with end-unit slider (lots more light!), wood fireplace and space for a working/sitting area.  Powder room and closet storage downstairs.  Brand new efficient HVAC (all electric).  Laundry closet upstairs.  Primary bedroom features large closet and private deck via slider door.  Upstairs loft outside bedrooms great for an office, pet area, play area.  Rear patio and shed, great space for grilling and storage.  New exterior entry way masonry and chimney, with house freshly washed.  50-unit street, with 1 reserved parking in front of unit, and 1 parking in open spots.  Seconds to route 202.  Adjacent to Wilson Farm Park with recreational facilities and the Chesterbrook shopping center.  Connected to Chesterbrook paths, valley creek, and a quick walk to historic Valley Forge Park. Minutes from 76, 476, PA Turnpike, and 422.  Minutes from Wegmans, KoP Town Center, Route 30, and King of Prussia Mall.Close to many corporate offices. Thirty minutes to PHL airport.  Rent includes HOA and sewer, tenant pays utilities (water, electric, cable/telephone/internet).

title: Adorable Norristown Home
description: Are you ready to purchase your first home? Look no further than this adorable twin located near Elmwood Park & Zoo! As you enter you will be greeted by hardwood floors,  that run throughout the home!  Cozy up in the living room with splashes of natural light coming from the triple windows in the front or the two sets of double-hung windows on the side of the house. As you gather in the dining room, don't miss the lovely arch that cascades above the recessed wall. This will give you more room to spread out during those festive occasions or display a beautiful piece that accents your style.  In the rear of the home is where all the cooking and gathering usually takes place! This eat-in kitchen could become your dream with a little elbow grease and imagination. With stainless steel appliances already here and solid wood cabinets. You could take this kitchen from the 1900s to 2023 in a snap!  Ready to charge up the beautiful staircase that features post and hardwood stairs to your second floor?  Here you will see additional hardwood flooring and three nice-sized bedrooms! The main bedroom is in the front of the home with lots of natural light, two closets, and a recessed archway that gives it that old-world charm. ! The second and third bedrooms on this floor also give you lots of natural light! The hall bath on this floor is white and black wet bed tile.  The unfinished basement has many possibilities.  With a newer 50 Gallon Gas Hot water heater, a Newer Gas Heating system, and a roof that was installed in 2017 and repointed brick on the entire house, all you need to do is move and start decorating!

title: You wont want to miss this Port Richmond Rental
description:
Welcome home to this row home, located in the heart of Port Richmond, home to Lunar Inn, Hers Daughter Cafe, Marinucci's Deli, Bonk's Bar, Nemi, ReAnimator Coffee and this amazing little spot that just opened called La Roma. A crisp, clean renovation--freshly painted- with new and efficient central air and heating, this home features original pine floors and an open first floor layout with stairs on the side.  Exposed brick. Ceiling mounted wine rack. The kitchen has lower cabinets with open upper cabinet storage, a window and French door to the rear yard for good light and stainless appliances. Upstairs, you'll find adjoining two bedrooms, both with nice light. The adjoining room has a chalkboard painted wall, making this an excellent office and/or walk-in closet. There is a rear bath with tub and glass doors, a pedestal sink and linen closet with window to the rear of the home. Bamboo roller shades in the living rooms and front bedroom. The basement is clean and dry and has washer, dryer and laundry storage cabinet. It would be great for overflow storage. The yard has an elevated deck and some grass as well--not pictured is an updated railing. Owner must meet and approve any pets subject to extra deposit.

title: Plush 4 BR, 3BA near Rittenhouse
description:
4 bedroom | 3 bath bi-level apartment at the corner of 17th and Fitzwater.
Enter the first floor into an open kitchen and living space ideal for dining with friends. To the right is the first full bathroom and bedroom. To the left is a door leading out to a private patio space. There is a secondary, direct access to the patio from the street so that bikes can be stored without having to take them through the apartment.
Up the stairs on the second floor there is a second bedroom and full bathroom. New hardwood flooring throughout the first and second floor of this apartment.
Take the stairs to the lower level which opens with a hallway connecting the third bedroom, utility room with a washer/dryer, the third full bathroom, and the fourth bedroom. The floor is tile throughout this level.
This apartment makes a very intuitive three bedroom by using the first floor bedroom as an extension to the common/living space.
Located at the North side of the Graduate Hospital Neighborhood, across the street form Marion Anderson park, two blocks off South St, seven blocks from Rittenhouse Square, and nine blocks from Super Fresh and Whole Foods.

title: You'll love your new place - 411
description:
MOVE-IN SPECIAL: $600 Security Deposit for qualified applicants. Special based upon your approval/application. Only 1st month and security to move in, no last month's rent!
Make yourself at home with us!
Our beautiful Apartment 411 is located within the fully renovated Croydon Hall located in Walnut Hill. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment features amazing views with tons of light in addition to granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, spacious layouts, environmentally friendly PVC and tile flooring, self-controlled heating and cooling via PTAC unit, and bathrooms equipped with a rainfall showerhead, tying everything together with sleek, modern finishes you'll be sure to love.
Monthly Rent: $1,625.00
Application Fee: $50 per applicant
Square Footage: 670
Lease Term: Flexible - Please Enquire!
Included Utilities: Water, Sewer, Trash, Recycle
Tenant Pays: Electric, Cable/Internet
Schools: Henry C. Lea Elementary, West Philadelphia High School
Parking: Street Parking is Free
Storage: Indoor Storage Units Available for $24.99/month
Unique Features
- Loading Zone for all your shopping needs
- Secure Entry with FOB access
- Online Resident Portal
- Smoke-Free Building
- Conference Room
- Free Bicycle Storage and Free Air for bike tires
- Enclosed Community Courtyard with gazebo, firepit, lawn games, and grill!
- Recreation Lounge with TV, Games, Vending Machines, Sharing Library & more
The Amenities
- Lobby Staffed 24/7 with Package Concierge
- Elevator Access on most floors
- Recently renovated 24-hour Laundry Room with card or mobile app payment
- Fully Equipped Fitness Center in Building, now with a Peleton!
- Playroom for the kiddies
Pet Policy
Pets are residents, too!
Two pets per apartment.
Breed & Weight restrictions apply*.
Non-refundable pet fee of $250/per pet with a $15 monthly fee/per pet.
The Community
- Within walking distance to Baltimore Ave., there are a number of cafes, restaurants, shops, co-ops, parks, community gardens, & even a tennis court in the neighborhood to enjoy!
- There are 2 bus stops within a block and a half (#42 & #21) and the MFL station is just a 10-15 minute stroll.
- Prefer to bike? We've got you covered with indoor bicycle racks, too!
Interested?
Property Management works on-site and is available M-F 9:30A-4:30P. Evening & weekend tours can be arranged with an agent as well. Need a virtual tour? We can do so if you have an iphone or ipad. Contact me today to schedule your private tour!
Don't see your move-in date?
Ask! We're sure to have something you'll love.
*All animals must be approved by management prior to move-in and during the course of residency.
Photos are of our model apartment.
Availability is subject to change rapidly, so contact us ASAP to schedule your private tour of our available floor plans!
